metadata.title: CVE-2017-0647 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in libziparchive could enable a local malicious application to access data outside of its permission levels. This issue is rated as Moderate because it could be used to access sensitive data without permission. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36392138.

criterions.comment: android-platform-system-core package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:7.0.0+r33-2').
